item.title: 根据美联社-NORC 最近的一项民意调查，十分之六的美国成年人表示，他们对拜登或特朗普担任总统的心理能力没有太大信心。
item.description:
Six in ten U.S. adults said they don’t have much confidence in Biden or Trump’s mental capabilities to serve as president, according to a recent AP-NORC poll.

AP’s Josh Boak explains more about this ahead of the upcoming presidential election. pic.twitter.com/fyIsVPa08P

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 虽然乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）几乎在每场竞选中都以较大优势获胜，并且是再次赢得各自党派提名的压倒性热门人选，但他们还不是 "推定提名人"。美联社记者梅格-金纳德（Meg Kinnard）将为您详细解读。
item.description:
While Joe Biden and Donald Trump have won almost every contest by large margins and are the overwhelming favorites to once again win their parties’ nominations, they’re not the “presumptive nominees” just yet. AP’s Meg Kinnard explains more. pic.twitter.com/P2IHGYih89

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 4, 2024
